byline.original: By JAMES ESTRIN and MICHAEL COOPER

lead_paragraph: To capture the work that goes into an opera’s elaborate staging, James Estrin, a Times photographer, observed weeks of rehearsals for the Met’s “Roberto Devereux.”

headline.print_headline: A Night (and So Many Days) at the Opera
headline.main: A Night (and Many Days) Backstage at the Metropolitan Opera

snippet: To capture the work that goes into an opera’s elaborate staging, James Estrin, a Times photographer, observed weeks of rehearsals for the Met’s “Roberto Devereux.”
abstract: Photos offer glimpse behind the scenes at Metropolitan Opera production of Donizetti’s Roberto Devereux.
